name: riak
description: A distributed NoSQL key-value data store that offers high availability, fault tolerance, operational simplicity, and scalability.
postInstallNotes:
Thank you for installing Riak on DC/OS.
Please run `dcos riak framework wait-for-service [--timeout <secs>]` until the Framework has fully started.
Visit https://github.com/basho-labs/riak-mesos for usage information.
preInstallNotes:
The Riak framework recommends at least 16GB of RAM and 8.0 CPUs per node to perform successfully.
Documentation: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/riak
postUninstallNotes: The DC/OS Riak Framework has been uninstalled.
